name: Punchual
short_description:
Going into lab later and later everyday? Punchual is an app for anyone who has ever struggled to get to lab, class, or anywhere else on time.  Built on the idea that measured performance is the key to success, Punchual makes tracking location goals effortless.  

Users set up location goals (e.g.  be in the gym at 6am) and Punchual tracks success rate 
automatically using the phone's location service.  MIT classes populate an autocomplete text box for easy setup.  The app displays data trends and gives weekly snapshots of how well the user is doing, helping to reinforce their objectives.
summary: Android App to Make Sure You Get There on Time
